content: Small Business Stories: 1) demo video; 2) map website; 3) social launch; 4) inbound submissions. Targets: 30 states coverage; publish client-style deliverables for admissions proof.
Portfolio architecture: interconnect capstones (AI ethics game, Small Business Stories, film club, congressional app) so outputs cross-amplify; each project has a service/impact layer.
insight_vector: Interconnected portfolio; each project → service layer

content: Outputs and metrics: NCWIT + YoungArts + NHD award targets; 100+ users for game; 30-state coverage for small business project; GPA ≥ 4.0. Plan commits to 3 priorities per week with artifact proofs.
insight_vector: Award targets; 100+ users; 30 states; 3 weekly priorities

content: Parent alignment blueprint: weekly artifacts mailed to counselor & principal; celebratory updates to maintain buy-in; requests framed as shared school wins → smoother recommendations & resources.
insight_vector: Parent alignment → counselor/principal buy-in → smoother recs

content: Adaptive pivots: if local business pool is thin, expand radius (Dublin/Tracy/East Bay), leverage Facebook community posts, and borrow trust via parent intros. Preserve Muslim business core for distinctiveness.
insight_vector: Geographic expansion + social broadcast; preserve distinctive core
